Title: Silverlight Debate Forum
Description: A Silverlight project that creates a Debate Forum. Uses MEF and View Model / MVVM, and allows the site to be skinned and changed dynamically at run-time.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A Silverlight project that creates a Debate Forum. Uses MEF and View Model / MVVM, and allows the site to be skinned and changed dynamically at run-time.
